title: Nemure Omoigo, Sora no Shitone ni
synopsis: A family was riding a car on their way home from a maternity hospital. Satomi and Yasunori were taking their newborn baby named "Orine" home and were filled with happy expectation. However, a sudden accident attacked them. Orine lost her parents, and she became alone.
characters: ['Shionoha, Satomi', 'Aoshima, Yuri', 'Shionoha, Orine', 'Shionoha, Yasunori', 'Seno, Mizuki', 'Shinoda, Yukio', 'Sensei']
voices: ['Inoue, Kikuko', 'Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Fukushima, Orine', 'Matsuda, Kenichirou', 'Ishiguro, Chihiro', 'Kijima, Ryuuichi', 'Hirata, Hiroaki']
